name: I'm a designer looking to share my work.
details: Most people know a designer and you'll get referrals, but your job is to find someone who's a fit for you.

name: I'm looking to hire a designer.
details: Many graphic designers advertise themselves online and show examples of their work. Reach out to individuals whose work matches what your business is looking for and set up interviews.

name: I'm looking for design inspiration.
details: Although you create your final designs digitally, inspiration for designers isn't limited to what you find through a screen. You can draw inspiration from introspection, social interactions, surroundings, music, nature, and architecture.
